attributes.additional_details:
Kinlochleven has a lot of empty space, teenagers have nothing to do.

Teenagers and kids in Kinlochleven utilise the outdoors to gain skills in Mountain biking and stunt riding. The Teenagers were promised a skate park and nothing has been done. This is to assist and help the process and give the children and teenagers a place to go to keep safe and gain skills. Proactive activities should be promoted and sought after.
